```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(mrgsolve)
library(overseer)
```


```{r}
models <- source("../models/models.R")$value
```



```{r}
available_models <- models$available()
```

```{r}
model_list <- map(available_models, ~ models$use(.x)) %>% setNames(available_models)
```

```{r }
tmp <- map(model_list, function(m) {
  see(m)
  cat("-----------------------------------")
  invisible()
  })
```
